Description: Ostracon (?), fragment of the upper-body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the interior is partly spotted with a brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394865) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394865)
